ValidationRule.description: using Label.Client_Retention_Status to enforce that Business Unit 1 is populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( OR(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin'),BEGINS($Profile.Name,'Non SSO - 2008-09 HRS 4S Operations B')) ), ISCHANGED(Current_Step__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Business_Unit_1__c)), OR( CONTAINS($Label.Client_Retention_Status, TEXT(Current_Step__c)), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, 'Sent to 2nd Level Support Team') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Business Unit 1 field for this Current Step value.
